FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find clear and direct answers to the most common queries. We are here to help you.

question1.q: What is a trademark and why is it important to register it?
question1.a: A trademark is a distinctive sign that allows a product or service to be differentiated from others on the market. Registering your trademark is essential because it gives you ownership and exclusive use of it, allowing you to protect your business against imitations or unauthorized uses. At Litvin Marzorati Legales, we use the latest technology in management software to make this process quick, efficient and with reduced costs, ensuring the best protection for your brand.

question2.q: What rights do I have when registering a trademark?
question2.a: By registering your trademark, you obtain the exclusive right to use it and to defend against any unauthorized use by third parties. In addition, you can license its use, sell it in whole or in part, and exercise all necessary legal actions to protect your intellectual property. With our innovative services, we ensure quick and hassle-free registration.

question3.q: Who can apply for trademark registration?
question3.a: Any natural or legal person can apply for the registration of a trademark. Additionally, certain sectors require brand registration accreditation for operations, such as the National Customs Directorate in Argentina. Our team advises you to comply with all the necessary legal requirements.

question4.q: How long does trademark protection last?
question4.a: A trademark registration is valid for 10 years from the date of grant and can be renewed indefinitely in successive 10-year periods. Our automated management system will alert you when it's time to renew, so you never lose your brand protection.

question5.q: What happens if someone tries to register a trademark similar to mine?
question5.a: You can oppose any application for registration of a similar or identical trademark within 30 days of its publication. We accompany you throughout the opposition process and in the defense of your rights, using advanced legal tools to ensure a favorable result.

question6.q: Why choose Litvin Marzorati Legales to register my trademark?
question6.a: At Litvin Marzorati Legales, we stand out for our innovation and efficiency in brand protection. We use the latest technologies to offer fast and affordable registration solutions, ensuring your brand is protected effectively and without complications.

question7.q: What types of signs can be registered as a trademark?
question7.a: A wide variety of signs can be registered, as long as they have distinctive capacity: words, images, logos, color combinations, among others. Our team will guide you to identify the best distinctive sign to protect your products or services effectively.

question8.q: I can protect all my products and services with a single trademark application?
question8.a: No, each trademark application must be directed to a specific class of goods or services according to the Nice Classification. There are 34 classes of products and 11 of services. At Litvin Marzorati Legales, we optimize your registration to make it as efficient as possible, using advanced technology that reduces costs and waiting times.

question9.q: How long does it take to get a trademark registered?
question9.a: The registration process, in the absence of oppositions, generally takes around 18 months. However, with our efficient management and the use of cutting-edge software, we work to minimize the times and costs involved.

question10.q: When is it advisable to start using my brand?
question10.a: Es aconsejable empezar a usar la marca una vez obtenida su registro para asegurar la protección legal total. En Litvin Marzorati Legales, te ayudamos a planificar una estrategia de uso que maximice la protección de tu marca desde el primer día.

question11.q: My trademark registration is valid for other countries?
question11.a: No, trademark registration has territorial validity. If you need international protection, we help you manage the registration in each country where you want to protect your brand.

brand-register.popup: What does a brand registration include?
brand-register.bullet1: Official fees of the National Institute of Industrial Property
brand-register.bullet2: Preparation and submission of the application
brand-register.bullet4: Notice of brand publication in the official gazette
brand-register.bullet5: Notices of possible oppositions filed by third parties for 10 years
brand-register.bullet7: Notice of brand usage declaration and renewal
